<a id="class_AudioEffectFilter"></a>

# AudioEffectFilter

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](class_audioeffect.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [AudioEffectBandLimitFilter](class_audioeffectbandlimitfilter.md), [AudioEffectBandPassFilter](class_audioeffectbandpassfilter.md), [AudioEffectHighPassFilter](class_audioeffecthighpassfilter.md), [AudioEffectHighShelfFilter](class_audioeffecthighshelffilter.md), [AudioEffectLowPassFilter](class_audioeffectlowpassfilter.md), [AudioEffectLowShelfFilter](class_audioeffectlowshelffilter.md), [AudioEffectNotchFilter](class_audioeffectnotchfilter.md)

Adds a filter to the audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Allows frequencies other than the [cutoff_hz](class_audioeffectfilter.md#class_AudioEffectFilter_property_cutoff_hz) to pass.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_AudioEffectFilter_property_cutoff_hz"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **cutoff_hz** = `2000.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectFilter_property_cutoff_hz)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_cutoff**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_cutoff**\ (\ )

Threshold frequency for the filter, in Hz.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectFilter_property_db"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[FilterDB](class_audioeffectfilter.md#enum_AudioEffectFilter_FilterDB) **db** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectFilter_property_db)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_db**\ (\ value\: [FilterDB](class_audioeffectfilter.md#enum_AudioEffectFilter_FilterDB)\ )
- [FilterDB](class_audioeffectfilter.md#enum_AudioEffectFilter_FilterDB) **get_db**\ (\ )

Steepness of the cutoff curve in dB per octave, also known as the order of the filter. Higher orders have a more aggressive cutoff.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectFilter_property_gain"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **gain** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectFilter_property_gain)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_gain**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_gain**\ (\ )

Gain amount of the frequencies after the filter.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_AudioEffectFilter_property_resonance"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **resonance** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#class_AudioEffectFilter_property_resonance)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_resonance**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_resonance**\ (\ )

Amount of boost in the frequency range near the cutoff frequency.
